title: RIOT HELP
body:
Thank you for your original response, but the place to submit a ticket asks you to log in, of which i can not do... please any other suggestions?

thanks

replies.body: Hi Thanks, I have submitted a ticket, so now I just have to wait, I hope Riot get back to me soon

If you can't login, you can submit an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) which goes to our account recovery team.  It won't require logging in to submit, and will get to the right place.  We'll reply back asap!
